thankyou.subject: Thank you!
thankyou.text: Our YHA IoT base app is designed to get developers started with user authenticated IoT applications.
thankyou.html:
YHA IoT

Making a Better World

Thank you for taking the first step towards designing a new and better world. Our IoT network provides valuable realtime sensor data and remote automation to make everyday tasks more reliable and efficient!

Sincerely, Eric Eisaman
